afscOM 0.1.0
  • Reference

    AFSC MSE Operating Model

    General design

    2 - fleet 2 - survey 2 - sex

    naming conventions:
    generally use snake_case

    t,…,T = time (typically annual step)
    a,…,A = age, starts at >=1, A is a plus group
    l,…,L = length_bin, L is a plus group
    s = sex, 1 or 2 if two then 1 = female, 2 = male - consider making a 3 for unsexed (e.g., unsexed size comps)

    _obs = observations
    _sd = standard deviation (or cv)
    _ind = index of 1 (use) or 0 (do not use), length T

    catch_obs - observed catch matrix dim T, n_fleet catch_sd - observed catch matrix dim T, n_fleet catch_ind - 1 = include, 0 = exclude, matrix dim T, n_fleet

    srv_obs - observed survey matrix dim TS, n_srv srv_sd - observed survey matrix dim TS, n_srv srv_ind - 1 = include, 0 = exclude, matrix dim T, n_srv

    patc_obs
    patc_ind
    patc_iss
